## 4.4.0

### Minor Changes

- 466c2f2: Update cli-kit and remove dotenv library

  The updated cli-kit will support multiline environment variables inside `.env` files so we don't need to use an
  external library anymore. Removing unused helper files.

## 4.3.0

### Minor Changes

- 3f7ebac: Remove raw JSON output to stdout for CI environments

  Any systems parsing the raw JSON output in stdout will need to parse the deployment url and auth bypass token from stderr instead.

- 7bad0d7: bumps @oclif/core to ^3.15.1 and @shopify/cli-kit to ^3.56.2 to match cli-hydrogen. This means the minimum required Node version is now v18.12.0.

## 4.0.0

### Major Changes

- f92253b: Remove `--publicDeployment` flag

  The behavior for how deployments are considered public or private is changing in the near future so we're removing this flag.

  If you need your deployment to be accessible without authentication (e.g. end-to-end testing frameworks) you should use `--generateAuthBypassToken`.

### Minor Changes

- 5528ab6: Default to npm build instead of yarn

### Patch Changes

- e7db80e: Add `--defaultEnvironment` flag

  This new flag will allow you to deploy to the default environment of an app regardless of any other metadata that might be present. For example, if you were in a Git repository on the `main` branch this would allow you to deploy to the default environment (usually some version of a "preview" environment). Without this flag you would be deploying to the environment tagged with `main` (usually a "production" environment).

- 2e2ec1e: Update vitest from 1.2.0 to 1.2.1
- 9fde899: Update oclif from 4.3.4 to 4.3.5
- 6a82491: Update vite from 5.0.11 to 5.0.12
- 872891f: Update oclif from 4.3.5 to 4.3.6
- 6e7d52b: Update oclif from 4.3.6 to 4.3.9

## 3.0.0

### Major Changes

- f8afe4e: Introduced `--generateAuthBypassToken` to create an auth bypass token when completing a deployment.

  - Changed the output of `src/deploy/index` to return a `CompletedDeployment` object instead of the deployment URL
  - In CI environments, JSONified `CompletedDeployment` object will be output to stdout instead of the deployment URL

### Patch Changes

- 8b4c8b7: Increase max label length

## 2.0.0

### Major Changes

- 6b06153: - Introduced a new `--skipVerification` command flag to optionally skip the deployment verification step.
  - Added a `--verificationMaxDuration` command flag to customize the maximum duration for the deployment verification step.
  - Retired the `--skipHealthCheck` and `healthCheckMaxDuration` flags. These have been replaced by `--skipVerification` and `--verificationMaxDuration` respectively.
  - Renamed the hooks `onHealthCheckStart`, `onHealthCheckComplete`, and `onHealthCheckError` to `onVerificationStart`, `onVerificationComplete`, and `onVerificationError` respectively.

### Patch Changes

- 7270e5d: Update oclif from 3.16.0 to 3.17.1
- 912c46a: Update eslint from 8.49.0 to 8.50.0
- 3d89d56: Update @types/async from 3.2.20 to 3.2.21
